29 import shutil
30 import os
31 import argparse
32 import time
33 import rospy
34 import sys
35 
36 ## Keeps a directory "clean" by limiting the number of files in it
37 class DirCleaner(object):
38  ## The constructor
39  def __init__(self):
40  pass
41 
42  ## Returns a list of files in a directory
43  # @param path The directory to be scanned
44  # @return The list of files in the directory
45  def listdir(self, path):
46  return os.listdir(path)
47 
48  ## Removes a file from the computer
49  # @param path The path to the file
50  def remove(self, path):
51  os.remove(path)
52 
53  ## Scans a directory, removing the files created the first,
54  # if their number exceeds the limit
55  # @param path The directory to scan and clean
56  # @param max_count The maximum number of files to be kept
57  def keep_local_max(self, path, max_count):
58  print("Cleaning..."),
59  name_list = self.listdir(path)
60  full_list = [os.path.join(path, i) for i in name_list]
61  time_sorted_list = sorted(full_list, key=os.path.getmtime)
62 
63  if len(time_sorted_list) > max_count:
64  for i in range(0, len(time_sorted_list) - max_count):
65  self.remove(time_sorted_list[i])
66 
67  print("cleaned: {0}".format(max(0, len(time_sorted_list) - max_count)))
68 
69  ## The worker thread to run the keep_local_max indefinitely
70  # @param path The path to work in
71  # @param keep_max The max amount of files to keep
72  def worker(self, path, keep_max, once = False):
73  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
74  self.keep_local_max(path, int(keep_max))
75  if once:
76  return
77  time.sleep(10)
78 
79  # Parses the parameters coming from the command line
80  # @param argv The list of parameters
81  # @return The parsed parameters
82  @staticmethod
83  def parseArgs(argv):
84  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(
85  prog='dir_cleaner.py', description='Cleans the given directory and keeps only the given number from the latest files', prefix_chars='-_')
86  parser.add_argument('-p', '--path', help='Path to keep clean', required=True)
87  parser.add_argument('-m', '--keep_max', default='10',help='Maximum files to keep')
88  parser.add_argument('-n', '__name:', default='10',help='Maximum files to keep')
89  parser.add_argument('-l', '__log:', default='10',help='Maximum files to keep')
90  return parser.parse_args(argv)
91 
92 def main():
93  print "Directory cleaner initalizing..."
94  rospy.init_node('dir_cleaner', anonymous=True)
95 
96  args = DirCleaner.parseArgs(sys.argv[1:])
97  dc = DirCleaner()
98 
99  try:
100  dc.worker(args.path, args.keep_max)
101  except KeyboardInterrupt:
102  pass
103 
104 ## The main function
105 if __name__ == '__main__':
106  main()
